channel.title: Homes on Sebastian Schinzel
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Sebastian Schinzel

item.title: presentations
item.description: Academic publications Find my list of publications at my University’s page. Press coverage My group’s University page lists some appearances in TV and print media . Two prominent publications I co-authored are the DROWN attack against TLS and the EFAIL vulnerabilities against OpenPGP and S/MIME email encryption. Talks I regularly speak at academic and industry conferences about computer security-related topics. Some conferences record presentations and make them public after the conferences.

item.title: about
item.description: Biography function checkHttps() { var url = "https://sebastian-schinzel.de"; if (window.location.href.indexOf(url) === -1 && window.location.hostname !== "localhost" && window.location.href.startsWith('file://') == false) { window.location = url; //window.location.reload(); } } // checkHttps(); I am a professor of computer science with a special interest in computer security. My research interests include system security and applied cryptography and I received my PhD from FAU Erlangen under the supervision of Prof. Felix Freiling. Currently, I lead the ITS group at MÃ¼nster University of Applied Sciences.
